requirement_tested: Implement a search functionality allowing users to input stock codes or names
user_persona: A financial analyst who needs to quickly find stock information.
user_goal: To search for a stock using its name or ticker symbol.

narrative_steps.title: Focusing Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Alex lands on the homepage and sees the centered search bar. He clicks on it to begin entering a stock name.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search input field is focused and ready for text entry.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Identifier
narrative_steps.description: Alex types 'AAPL' into the search bar to look up Apple Inc.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'AAPL' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Text 'AAPL' appears in the search field.

requirement_tested: Provide auto-suggested stock matches during search input
user_persona: A new investor exploring different stocks.
user_goal: To get suggestions while typing to find the correct stock easily.

narrative_steps.title: Typing Partial Name
narrative_steps.description: Jamie starts typing 'Tesla' in the search bar and waits briefly.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Tesla' into the search input field and wait for 300ms.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dropdown list of suggested matches appears below the search bar.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Suggestion
narrative_steps.description: Jamie hovers over the first suggestion 'TSLA - Tesla, Inc.' and clicks it.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the suggestion and click on it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar is populated with 'TSLA - Tesla, Inc.', and the stock details page loads.

requirement_tested: Display basic stock information including company name, ticker symbol, and current price
user_persona: An investor checking a specific stock's key details.
user_goal: To view essential information about a selected stock.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Stock Details
narrative_steps.description: Casey searches for 'GOOGL' and navigates to the stock overview page.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the stock details page for GOOGL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A card titled 'Stock Overview' displays the company name, ticker symbol, and current price.

requirement_tested: Show market trend data with interactive charts and historical price movements
user_goal: To analyze historical price movements using interactive charts.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Chart
narrative_steps.description: Morgan views the stock details and sees the interactive price chart.
narrative_steps.action: Load the stock details page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An interactive line chart showing the last 30 days of price movement is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Changing Timeframe
narrative_steps.description: Morgan clicks on the '1Y' interval button to see a broader view.
narrative_steps.action: Click the '1Y' interval button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart updates to show one year of historical price data.

requirement_tested: Present comprehensive financial data including revenue, earnings, and key ratios
user_persona: A financial analyst evaluating company health.
user_goal: To review key financial metrics of a company.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Financial Summary
narrative_steps.description: Riley scrolls down to the financial summary section after selecting a stock.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the financial summary section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A table with financial metrics like Revenue, Net Income, and P/E Ratio is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Switching Views
narrative_steps.description: Riley toggles to the quarterly view to see more frequent updates.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Quarterly' toggle.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The table updates to show quarterly financial data.

requirement_tested: Offer customizable report format options for users to select
user_goal: To generate a report in a preferred format.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Format
narrative_steps.description: Jordan selects the 'PDF' format for the report.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'PDF' format button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The PDF button is visually selected, and the choice is stored.

requirement_tested: Enable content selection features allowing users to choose specific report sections
user_persona: A researcher needing only specific data.
user_goal: To customize the content included in the report.

narrative_steps.title: Customizing Sections
narrative_steps.description: Taylor unchaecks 'News & Sentiment' since it's not needed for the report.
narrative_steps.action: Click the checkbox next to 'News & Sentiment'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The checkbox is unchecked, and the section is removed from the report content set.

requirement_tested: Generate automated stock reports based on user-selected parameters
user_persona: An analyst requiring regular stock summaries.
user_goal: To generate a customized stock report.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Report
narrative_steps.description: Miles clicks the 'Generate Report' button after selecting format and content.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A progress indicator appears, and the report is generated and downloaded.

requirement_tested: Include export functionality for generated reports in multiple formats
user_persona: A consultant sharing findings with clients.
user_goal: To export a report in a client-preferred format.

narrative_steps.title: Exporting Report
narrative_steps.description: Casey clicks the download icon next to the generated report preview.
narrative_steps.action: Click the download icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dropdown menu with export format options appears.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Export Format
narrative_steps.description: Casey selects 'DOCX' from the dropdown to export the report.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'DOCX' option.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The report downloads in DOCX format.

requirement_tested: Implement a clean user interface with white background and navy component colors
user_persona: A user with visual sensitivity to clutter.
user_goal: To navigate a clean and consistently styled interface.

narrative_steps.title: Observing UI Design
narrative_steps.description: Sam lands on the homepage and notices the clean white background and navy components.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page displays a white background with all interactive elements in navy blue.

requirement_tested: Provide real-time stock data updates and synchronization
user_persona: A day trader monitoring live prices.
user_goal: To see real-time updates of stock prices.

narrative_steps.title: Watching Live Updates
narrative_steps.description: Jules observes the stock price updating automatically every 30 seconds.
narrative_steps.action: Stay on the stock details page for over 30 seconds.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The stock price updates automatically without manual refresh.

requirement_tested: Display news and market sentiment related to searched stocks
user_persona: An investor interested in market perception.
user_goal: To read recent news and sentiment about a stock.

narrative_steps.title: Expanding News Panel
narrative_steps.description: Riley clicks to expand the 'Latest News & Market Sentiment' panel.
narrative_steps.action: Click the expand button for the news panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The panel expands to show a list of recent articles and sentiment scores.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Article
narrative_steps.description: Riley clicks on a news article title to read more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on an article title.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The article opens in a new browser tab.

requirement_tested: Include comparison tools to benchmark stocks against industry peers
user_persona: An equity analyst comparing stock performance.
user_goal: To compare a stock's metrics with industry peers.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Stock for Comparison
narrative_steps.description: Quinn clicks 'Add Stock to Compare' and enters a competitor's ticker.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Add Stock to Compare' and enter a competitor ticker.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The comparison chart updates to include the new stock's metrics.

requirement_tested: Offer saved report history and template management for returning users
user_persona: A recurring user who frequently generates similar reports.
user_goal: To access and reuse previous report configurations.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Report History
narrative_steps.description: Dana navigates to the 'My Reports' section to find a past report.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the 'My Reports' section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of previously generated reports with timestamps and formats is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Previous Configuration
narrative_steps.description: Dana clicks on a past report to load its settings for a new generation.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a past report entry.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The report configuration loads into the editor for regeneration or modification.

requirement_tested: Ensure responsive design for accessibility across desktop and mobile devices
user_persona: A mobile user accessing stock data on the go.
user_goal: To use the website seamlessly on a mobile device.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing Window
narrative_steps.description: Lee resizes the browser window to simulate a mobile screen size.
narrative_steps.action: Resize the browser window to 480px width.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The layout adapts using responsive design, rearranging elements for mobile view.

narrative_steps.title: Using Touch Interaction
narrative_steps.description: Lee swipes horizontally through a multi-page report preview.
narrative_steps.action: Perform a touch swipe gesture on the report preview.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The report pages scroll horizontally in response to the swipe.
